title: rustc panicked at Box<Any>

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

Code has been compiling for the past week or so, today I get this.  Do not know exactly which section of the code base is causing the error?  Let me know if there are anymore flags I can set to get more information out of the compiler...
